At what point I wonder does the board of the @EnvAgency get the idea, enough is enough.

 Time to go. https://t.co/M5evoU2hhT

tweets.text:
Never in my life in the UK did I think fresh air would be a luxury but this is our life now in #newcastleunderlyme A family member has taken me to get the freshest air because where I live cant provide us with that anymore.

@EnvAgencyMids @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe #STOPTHESTINK https://t.co/Dv2UXf6ZbA

People saying their eyes and nose are stinging, their house is stinking, they can‚Äôt open windows, and are fed up of this. 

The Environment Agency has given the landfill owners until the end of the month to carry out works. 

Will it get better then?

Great job by @joe_crowley on sewage discharges on Panorama last evening. Shame the @EnvAgency declined to appear, too many difficult questions to answer, what does EA stand for "Evasive, Always".

https://t.co/a5vQAo5gNL

urls.title: Panorama - The River Pollution Scandal
urls.description: Joe Crowley reveals how some big water companies illegally dump untreated sewage.

tweets.text: @Sue4AudleyWard @MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency With all due respects Cllr Sue we watched you all agree action at recent meeting, the letters have been sent, the peaceful protest took place with MP & CllrTagg speaking, EA say they are monitoring but we were gassed again last night & I am 2 miles from Landfill. We need ACTION!!

tweets.text:
From new years day 2021, to March 31 there have been 11587 complaints made to the @EnvAgencyMids about Walleys Quarry landfill, run by @RedIndustries2. Last night was one of the worst in memory for the toxic fumes entering our homes.
@JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA  Resign!!!!

Officers from the team have again been conducted patrols with @EnvAgency Fisheries Officers, and the #LocalPolicing teams along #Devon waterways as part of #OpClampDown9 to tackle #AntisocialBehaviour, #Poaching, #IllegalFishing & #Fish #Theft. üêüüé£ https://t.co/FDn5HVDQ57

@StaffordshireCC @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @PHE_WestMids @GolderAssociate No answers from anyone!! Either the GasSim model is wrong or the landfill site is breaching it's permit, you can't have it both ways. @EnvAgencyMids have been letting @RedIndustries2 get away with it for years. Corruption, weak EA management or fear of Red Industries? Answers???

The River Wandle is one of only two urban chalk streams in London.

There are believed to be 10 times more coral reef on the planet than there are chalk streams. https://t.co/nQzbS0aFx0
@markroffey @EnvAgency @LDNWaterkeeper Foul ü§¢ (Not that they will be interested, but have you reported to @EnvAgencySE ?)

@StaffordshireCC @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @PHE_WestMids What happened to the GasSim model at Walley's Quarry @GolderAssociate clearly a huge error has been made! The engines and flare should be capable of burning 85% of the gas! What went wrong??

tweets.text: @BBCPanorama The @EnvAgency cannot protect our waterways and they can‚Äôt protect our clean air either.They are letting Walley‚Äôs quarry landfill spew out uncontrolled gases into the environment.Please investigate this criminal act, our community is suffering!#stopthestink #panorama https://t.co/i0WMkygv8D

@maireadc_2010 @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @daera_ni How is the legal action funded please? We can't breathe here in Newcastle-under-Lyme. Just been woken by eggy caustic air & my throat is now burning. All my windows are shut and even my window vent strips are too. Tomorrow I'm supposed to deliver quality healthcare on no sleep.
